entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
